src:
Attack mot Semafo-personal i Burkina Faso – flera döda
Det Stockholmsnoterade gruvbolaget Semafo rapporterar på torsdagen att en attack inträffat i närområdet av den gruva i Burkina Faso som bolaget driver. Flera personer uppges ha blivit dödade och skadade, enligt ett pressmeddelande. 
06 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Jonathan Axelsson

text:
Attack on Semafo personnel in Burkina Faso - several dead
The Stockholm-listed mining company Semafo reports on Thursday that an attack occurred in the immediate vicinity of the Burkina Faso mine that the company operates. Several people are said to have been killed and injured, according to a press release.
06 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Jonathan Axelsson
